info.name: Ban
info.author: Kio
info.description: Use this command to ban others!

cant_ban_others: You're not someone who should be banning others! ><
cant_ban_kiru: Using me to ban myself is not nice!
cant_ban_owner: You can't ban the owner of this server!
cant_ban_higher_than_kiru: I can't ban {username} because they're higher than me in the hierarchy.
cant_ban_higher_than_user: I can't ban {username} because they're higher than you in the hierarchy.
banedmembers: I succefully banned {amount} users. That's a lot... >~<
